languages.text:
У каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия существуют две области стрельбы, эффективная и максимальная, задаваемые параметрами дальности. Параметр максимальной дальности стрельбы указывает допустимое расстояние для стрельбы по цели. Параметр эффективной дальности равен 50% от максимальной и показывает, на каком расстоянии стрельба будет наиболее эффективной.
Более подробную информацию можно можно узнать в статье про {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}области стрельбы{/g}.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.
languages.original_text:
У каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционного{/g} оружия существуют две области стрельбы, эффективная и максимальная, задаваемые параметрами дальности. Параметр максимальной дальности стрельбы указывает допустимое расстояние для стрельбы по цели. Параметр эффективной дальности равен 50% от максимальной и показывает, на каком расстоянии стрельба будет наиболее эффективной.
Более подробную информацию можно можно узнать в статье про {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}области стрельбы{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Every ranged weapon that fires single shots or bursts has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the article on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the article on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

Every ranged weapon that fires single shots or bursts has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon that fires {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}bursts{/g} has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hitting{/g} a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

languages.text:
Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffe hat zwei Schussbereiche, die durch die Reichweitenparameter der Waffe bestimmt werden: effektive Reichweite und maximale Reichweite. Der Parameter für die maximale Reichweite gibt die maximale Distanz an, auf die du ein Ziel triffst. Der Parameter für die effektive Reichweite entspricht 50 % der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe und gibt die optimale Distanz für das Abfeuern der Waffe an.
Inwiefern sich die effektive und maximale Reichweite im Fernkampf auswirkt, erfährst du im Abschnitt {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}Schusszonen{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffe{/g}, die {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}einzelne Schüsse{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Geschosse{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}abfeuert{/g}, hat zwei Schussbereiche, die durch die Reichweitenparameter der Waffe bestimmt werden: effektive Reichweite und maximale Reichweite. Der Parameter für die maximale Reichweite gibt die größtmögliche Distanz an, auf die du ein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}triffst{/g}. Der Parameter für die effektive Reichweite entspricht 50% der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe und gibt die Distanz an, bei der das Abfeuern der Waffe optimal wäre.
Mehr darüber, wie sich effektive und maximale Reichweite auf den Fernkampf auswirken, erfährst du im Abschnitt über {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}Feuerzonen{/g}.

Jede {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffe hat zwei Schussbereiche, die durch die Reichweitenparameter der Waffe bestimmt werden: effektive Reichweite und maximale Reichweite. Der Parameter für die maximale Reichweite gibt die maximale Distanz an, auf die du ein Ziel triffst. Der Parameter für die effektive Reichweite entspricht 50 % der maximalen Reichweite der Waffe und gibt die optimale Distanz für das Abfeuern der Waffe an.
Inwiefern sich die effektive und maximale Reichweite im Fernkampf auswirkt, erfährst du im Abschnitt {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}Schusszonen{/g}.

languages.text:
Toutes les armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} possèdent deux zones de tir déterminées par leurs paramètres de portée : la portée efficace et la portée maximale. Le paramètre de portée maximale représente la distance maximale à laquelle il est possible d'atteindre une cible. Le paramètre de portée efficace est égal à 50 % de la portée maximale de l'arme et représente la distance à laquelle le tir peut être optimisé.
Pour en savoir davantage à propos de l'impact de la portée efficace et de la portée maximale sur le combat à distance, consultez la section relative aux {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}zones de tir{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

Le paramètre de portée efficace est égal à 50 % de la portée maximale de l'arme et représente la distance à laquelle le tir peut être optimisé.
Pour en savoir davantage à propos de l'impact de la portée efficace et de la portée maximale sur le combat à distance, consultez la section relative aux {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}zones de tir{/g}.

languages.text:
每种{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器都有两片开火区域，分别对应有效射程与最大射程。武器的射程由武器自身属性决定。最大射程代表武器有可能命中目标的最远距离。有效射程为最大射程的一半，代表武器命中率最高的距离。
您可以在{g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}开火区域{/g}一节中，找到更多有效射程与最大射程的介绍，查看它们在战斗中的具体效果。

Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

languages.original_text:
Every ranged weapon that fires single shots or bursts has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

languages.text:
Todas las armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} cuentan con dos zonas de disparo, determinadas por los parámetros de alcance del arma: el alcance efectivo y el alcance máximo. El parámetro de alcance máximo indica la distancia máxima posible a la que puede impactar a un objetivo. El parámetro de alcance efectivo equivale a un 50 % del alcance máximo del arma e indica la distancia en la que resultaría más efectivo disparar con el arma.
Puedes descubrir más sobre el efecto del alcance efectivo y el máximo en combate en la sección {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}zonas de disparo{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Every {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon has two firing areas determined by the weapon's range parameters: effective range and maximum range. The maximum range parameter denotes the farthest possible distance for hitting a target. The effective range parameter is equal to 50% of the weapon's maximum range and indicates the distance at which firing the weapon would be the most optimal.
You can find out more about how effective and maximum ranges affect ranged combat in the section on {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}firing zones{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Todas las armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} cuentan con dos zonas de disparo, determinadas por los parámetros de alcance del arma: el alcance efectivo y el alcance máximo. El parámetro de alcance máximo indica la distancia máxima posible a la que puede impactar a un objetivo. El parámetro de alcance efectivo equivale a un 50 % del alcance máximo del arma e indica la distancia en la que resultaría más efectivo disparar con el arma.
Puedes descubrir más sobre el efecto del alcance efectivo y el máximo en combate en la sección {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}zonas de disparo{/g}.

languages.text:
単発式や連射で発射する{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}武器には2つの射撃範囲があり、その範囲は武器の射程パラメータである有効射程および最大射程により決まる。最大射程パラメータは標的を撃つことのできる最大の距離を表す。有効射程パラメータは武器の最大射程の50%に相当し、射撃の最適距離を示す。
有効射程と最大射程が遠距離戦闘に及ぼす影響については{g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}射撃ゾーン{/g}の項を参照。
